reviewText: This dvd is excellent if you know literally nothing about defense. If you have even a weeks knife training, you probably learned everything in this dvd.  He is very concise and clear about all instruction, so deserves a 3*, but if you're looking for a curriculum for knife defense beyond "knives have a point end," and "there are two zones-red& green," I would look elsewhere.
Informative but does not include training drills
